name: The Pusher
description: In "The Pusher" the player has to mix different chemicals and raw materials to... let's say interesting new substances and sell them to the consumers on the street. Do customers love your product because of the beautiful things they see when they take it or do they need it, even if it has a bad effect on them?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 460 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 460 or higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 120 MB available space
